text: Claude Rich (8 February 1929 – 20 July 2017) was a French actor and screenwriter.Le comédien Claude Rich est décédé He was born in Strasbourg, France. He began his career in the theater before his movie debut in 1955. His best known roles were in Season's Beatings, With a Little Help from Myself, and in Looking for Hortense. Rich died on 20 July 2017 in Orgeval, France of prostate cancer at the age of 88.Le comédien Claude Rich est décédé ==References== ==Other websites== * *Report Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:Cancer deaths in France Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors
title: Claude Rich
